archimate:Requirement.name: PM.1.5.6d: d) avoiding the use of unknown equipment for communicating or processing sensitive information (e.g. equipment provided by unknown individuals or available in internet cafÃ©s)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
